pageContext.claim: “But to get it going the way I really want, where we have GDP getting up to 4, 5, and even 6 percent -- because I think that's possible.  If you look back in your notes, you'll say when I said 4 percent, people said that would be years.  Well, it's turned out that I'm right because without the hurricanes this last quarter, we would have hit 4 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump promised four percent annual growth in the gross domestic product, not quarterly growth.
